greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A329697(sigma(n)), where A329697 is totally additive with a(2) = 0 and a(p) = 1 + a(p-1) for odd primes.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = A329697(sigma(p^e)) = A329697(1+ p + p^2 + ... + p^e).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 11 2020
